00020 // default sprites...when an object is spawned it's sprite is set to this
00021 // sprite. the object AI will immediately reset the sprite frame, so it
00022 // wouldn't really matter what these are...except that it does because
00023 // the width and height of the default sprite will determine exactly when
00024 // the object because active the first time it scrolls onto the screen
00025 // from the top or left. if the default sprite is wrong the object may
00026 // suddenly appear on the screen instead of smoothly scrolling on.
00027
